name: bloglist-e2e-tests_cypress
description: E2E test with use of Cypress (Full Stack Open)

scripts.start:app: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c yellow,cyan "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:test:e2e: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,TESTS -c yellow,cyan,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npx cypress run"
scripts.start:test:e2e:gui: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,TESTS -c yellow,cyan,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npx cypress open"

author: Saribeh Karakhanian
